body: he shpuld have had just said yes to her. if I had that kind of relationship with mine, No way in hell I would let another bastard take her even for a second!

Another iffy NTR tag... She wasn't even stolen since she was his (oniichan's) all along, unless one is the counting the husband, but she was never truly his. Those two siblings were deluding themselves and to each other that they weren't each other's SO and were merely delaying the inevitable. And she went out of her way to cheat. Now if she had a bf/lover when her onii-chan "corrupted" her for the first time, THEN it would be NTR.
